content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=5.5, y=0.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=5.5, y=0.5), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), and pipe connections.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-84.0) 
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace(position x=52.0, y=-80.0) 

### Stone brick factory at position(x=62.0, y=-54.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace(position x=62.0, y=-54.0)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of a lab with no power and research automation.

### Pipe group at position(x=-0.5, y=-2.5)
Consists of multiple pipes connecting the offshore pump to the steam engine.

### Electricity group at unknown position
Consists of two small electric poles at positions (x=3.5, y=0.5) and (x=7.5, y=-0.5) with zero voltage.


### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using insert_item
- Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted.
- Ensure the entity has available space for the item being inserted.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure the entities are properly connected to the power network.
- Ensure the entities have the required input liquids or fluids.

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure the offshore pump is properly connected to the fluid system.
- Ensure the offshore pump has the required fluid present in its connections.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure the steam engine is properly connected to the power network.
- Ensure the steam engine has the required input liquid or fluid.
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to a fluid system.
